snippet.title: 😈 Obey Me! Nightbringer Opening Movie 😈
snippet.description:
With thanks to all of the RAD exchange students around the world, we are proud to announce the latest installment in the Obey Me! series, Obey Me! Nightbringer 🎉💕
Ahead of its release later this year, we present to you the opening movie 🎬

We couldn’t have done this without you and we hope you're excited about its release!
Let us know what you thought in the comment section below.

We'll be posting info about Obey Me! Nightbringer on the accounts below, so don't forget to follow them!
Twitter Obey Me! series: https://twitter.com/ObeyMeOfficial1
Twitter Obey Me! Nightbringer: https://twitter.com/obeymenben
Instagram Obey Me! series: https://www.instagram.com/obey_me_official/
Instagram Obey Me! Nightbringer: https://www.instagram.com/obeyme_nb/

Also check out these new communities!
Reddit： https://www.reddit.com/user/Obey_Me_Official
Discord：https://discord.com/invite/6wRDz22QcV
TikTok： https://www.tiktok.com/@obey_me_official_tiktok

Click here for a list of official Obey Me! sites. 👇
https://linktr.ee/obeyme_official




🐏💙💛🧡💚💗❤️💜

📢 What is Obey Me!?
Obey Me! is a mobile game series about taming hot demons that was originally released for English audiences in 2019 and has since reached over 6 million downloads worldwide!

Official website:  https://shallwedate.jp/obeyme/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/obeyme.solmare/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Obey_me_off...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ObeyMeOfficial1

📢 Download for:
Android/iOS
https://app.adjust.com/b5d9ovt_c93y2v0

📢 Enjoy more Obey Me! goodness!

📺 Anime
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjtqZEeWgUQvjGVVvS5pVBZlnzGgcAXWU

🎤 Character songs
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjtqZEeWgUQue840Gv2Klycw9jwaaj1HP

🎧 Audio dramas
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjtqZEeWgUQvkQX_nouuh7mBvDPvr5_y9

🎙 Podcast
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjtqZEeWgUQsPx4zz2NGe5xye-wEZXRgU

🎭 VA cast shows
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjtqZEeWgUQtTKPFX58fNmMWGbK1Ai_8-

日本語版の最新情報はこちら！
公式サイト: https://shallwedate.jp/obeyme/
公式Twitter: https://twitter.com/ObeyMeOfficial
